channel.title: [PI]Split Private Chat
channel.description:
Hello, I have been checking booleans for a very long time attempting to find what has my private chat not split by default. I don't exactly know where to start or what I am looking for, I have looked at everything in every file with Chat, and Split in it.
Please help ;)

item.title: [PI]Split Private Chat
item.dc:creator: @insaneli insaneli
item.description:
@insaneli wrote:

So after searching for a while, I am still unable to fix this…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Split Private Chat
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“insaneli, post:3, topic:441903”]I found

If this is it, thanks a million - had no idea it was server sided honestly.

EDIT: I just decided to add splitChat = true; onto login :P[/quote]

There’s actually a way to set it based on user input.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Split Private Chat
item.dc:creator: @insaneli insaneli
item.description:
@insaneli wrote:

I found

If this is it, thanks a million - had no idea it was server sided honestly.

EDIT: I just decided to add splitChat = true; onto login

item.title: [PI]Split Private Chat
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“insaneli, post:1, topic:441903”]Hello, I have been checking booleans for a very long time attempting to find what has my private chat not split by default. I don’t exactly know where to start or what I am looking for, I have looked at everything in every file with Chat, and Split in it.

Please help ;)[/quote]

It’s a config set by the server. You need to figure out the right config id, and value. (or just rip it from an existing server)

Read full topic
